testcase.name: Oracle Connection Successful

error.message:
Communications link failure
The last packet sent successfully to the server was 0 milliseconds ago. The driver has not received any packets from the server.

When I executed "select 1 from dual" query # Oracle_StepDefinitions.i_executed_query(String) Then I should get the result as connection "success" # Oracle_StepDefinitions.i_should_get_the_result_as_connection(String)
testcase.system-err: Loading class `com.mysql.jdbc.Driver'. This is deprecated. The new driver class is `com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver'. The driver is automatically registered via the SPI and manual loading of the driver class is generally unnecessary.
